website_summaries.verdict: These strong, sturdy trash bags are ideal for both everyday use and for use in heavy-duty cleaning and trash needs.
pros: Sold as a 74-pack, bags are sturdy and can handle up to 30 gallons of trash
These are meant to fit well in large garbage cans
They are also an ideal option for storing seasonal items and clothing
cons: Bags do not have a fragrance

customer_reviews.title: THE SCENT-FREE VERSION IS NOT SCENT-FREE
customer_reviews.text: This review is for people like me who do not tolerate artificial fragrances: The box says that it "May contain a light scent." My boxes and the bags in them did indeed contain a light scent. To me it was a sickly sweet fragrance. I opened the boxes and put the contents outside to off-gas. I going stored them outside on the carport, but the scent did not go away even after several days. I do like the strength of the bags, but I will be looking for another brand which is truly unscented for my next purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Liese A. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for tall Kitchen Trash Can, Strong, Unscented.
customer_reviews.text: Hefty are my go to trash bags. I like the 30 gal size for my kitchen trash can. They fit and fill the whole can alot better than "tall kitchen bags". The hefty bags are very strong and have a good pull tie. I have not had any problems with the bag splitting when full. The black plastic is dark enough so you can not see the trash inside like some translucent black plastic bags. They are unscented and i dont notice any smell. They seem like they do not leak any liquids. Delivery from Amazon was on time and un damaged. I will order again.
customer_reviews.author: C J M

customer_reviews.title: Working very well for us
customer_reviews.text: Our usual brand. Always consistent. Strong and good size. Don't forget to use the Smile.Amazon.com address - It's an Amazon program where many things you buy every day will generate a small donation to the charity of your choice. Read about it here:
customer_reviews.author: 🌈 KT

customer_reviews.title: Thicker quality is worth the extra cost
customer_reviews.text: I use these heavier bags in a kitchen-size trash can because the kitchen-size bags kept ripping. I was continually having to put the ripped bags in another bag before putting these bags in my large garbage cans. Bigger than I want, but less mess and fewer bags used in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: JaneTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Stink stank stunk
customer_reviews.text: The product description said that some boxes would be scented and some would not. I was 'lucky' enough to get scented. It is now sitting in a sealed plastic bag so I can't get a migraine, and Amazon won't let me return the putrid unopened box. The item picture is extremely misleading, and I was expecting to get a nice benign box of body bags... I mean trash bags.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality trash bag
customer_reviews.text: Hefty,Hefty, Hefty....not wimpy, wimpy, wimpy. load it up, there is a reason you pay a bit more for these name brand bags. They won't tear as easily as the others. No fancy-dancy smell to them either. Better for burglarizing as they are unscented so you won't sneeze while robbing the neighborhood. Also, they are black so you don't have the visibility of a white trash bag giving away your location. Hides objects better. If you've ever thrown away an old dildo then you know, white bag are not your friend. Buy these trash bags for many, many wonderful reasons.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Haller

customer_reviews.title: Holds maybe 30 pounds before you can't carry it by the drawstrings.
customer_reviews.text: I generate a lot of waste at the workshop (1-2 of these garbage bags on a work day), and some of it can be heavy. If you exceed about 30 pounds, the drawstrings will definitely break if you lift the bag by the strings. This means you will carry a lot of bags with a hand on the bottom of the bag if you're not careful.
customer_reviews.author: E. Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Strong is all relative based on your usage situation
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't rebuy. I was looking for heavy duty (not the very high mil construction grade you see at Home Depot) but something stronger than the cheap white kitchen bags. On occasion, I need to put a couple of my filled (tall size) kitchen garbage bags and combine into one heavy duty bag. These are not strong enough for that purpose and not worth the money to me for that usage.
customer_reviews.author: Shoppaholic

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth Buying
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying Hefty trash bags from Amazon for years. I normally buy the box of 56 (I think or close to that). However, in an attempt to save money, I bought these instead. I don't know what happened to Hefty, but these Hefty trash bags are substandard compared to others. They are not as thick, strong or sturdy. As a result, I have to use two trash bags, so I am not saving money -- but spending more! I am really disappointed because now I have to search for another brand to handle my trash needs.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen J

customer_reviews.title: Great trash bags
customer_reviews.text: I own a 22 Gallon automatic trash can and it's impossible to find the right size. I went with the 30 gallon and it works perfectly. It hangs out a little but still works great. It's very sturdy and never rips or tears. One box last us a couple months.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Marmorstein

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy enough for most uses
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my guinea pigs cage cleaning, and it holds up well for the short trip down to the trash bin. However, because of the small holes that are often created by hay from their cage, stuff escapes unless I double bag. I have yet to find one that doesn't need to be double bagged though, so overall, a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Jon F Giese

customer_reviews.title: Not the Same
customer_reviews.text: My last order of these bags was a disappointment. Not sure if they got thinner or what. They rip and fall apart unless you fil them halfway. If I fill the bag all the way it will get a hole in it just trying to tie the drawstrings. Then I have to use a second bag on top of the original. I guess I will have to find a new brand.
customer_reviews.author: Buzz Texas

customer_reviews.title: Trusted Trash Bag
customer_reviews.text: This is the only trash bag brand I trust for heavy duty use. I often consolidate all other trash bags throughout the house into this bag to be put outside, and even when I fill it to the brim and/or put a lot of heavy items in it, the bag stretches but doesn't fall apart. I've tried other popular brands that couldn't handle the load so sticking with this!
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Does what a trash bag should.
customer_reviews.text: They are trash bags that do what a trash bag should do. Hold my trash. Not break under strain or leak. Scent, I guess, is a nice thing to have if you really want that... but once you put trash in it my main concern is that it stays in it. These do that nicely.
customer_reviews.author: C.Rahm

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for very light trash. DO NOT overfill or the tops will tear.
customer_reviews.text: After I filled the bags and went to lift them, they ripped just below the drawstring. I used them for picking up light debris and clothes. If you fill it only half full with Tshirts it would probably still tear.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Hutson

customer_reviews.title: Confidence in strength and multi-uses
customer_reviews.text: I use the Hefty Strong Large 30 gallon trash bags for everything from lining my kitchen trash can to clothing and other donations to lining the floor under my kitties' litter boxes. I buy these because of their strength and sturdiness and the confidence they give me that things are not going to break through the bag and scatter before I even get them to the collection can. My favorite bags!
customer_reviews.author: S. Warfield

customer_reviews.title: Best bags I have used so far!
customer_reviews.text: We have a lot of garbage, and no disposer (yet), and previous bags I had were a nightmare as they dripped all over and tore open from every little scuff. even just pulling an overfilled bag from the trash put small tears in it. Not with these! Moved into my shopping items!
customer_reviews.author: Ofir Golan

customer_reviews.title: Work great for 20 gallon cans!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to fit my new 20 gallon Glad trash cans I bought. They advertised the Glad bags but they were entirely too expensive, these give you a little extra room and they don’t break which is a bonus. I will continue to buy these for my large capacity cans.
customer_reviews.author: PenelopeC

customer_reviews.title: It's a shame
customer_reviews.text: This product is so nice, I cant convince myself to put trash in it. Now I have all these bags and my trash is taking up my entire counter space. Now I have ants and cockroaches and I'm getting my house "bombed" tomorrow. Which is great because I can use these bags to cover my electronics
customer_reviews.author: sticky dan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy bags
customer_reviews.text: We have been using the Hefty Brand for years without issue. They rarely puncture, hold a ton of waste and are very easy to remove from the box one at a time. One less thing to worry about.
customer_reviews.author: The Illuminator

customer_reviews.title: No issues with tearing
customer_reviews.text: These have a bit of a stronger trash bag smell than some other trash cans. These bags aren’t attractive but they get the job done. We haven’t had issues with reading even when sharp-ish things have been in the recycling or trash. They’re good trash bags.
customer_reviews.author: Author Sable Sylvan (Heather Davies)

customer_reviews.title: Tough bags
customer_reviews.text: So far, they are holding up great. No rips or tears, even with heavy loads.
customer_reviews.author: BriBri

customer_reviews.title: Awful scent
customer_reviews.text: Why on earth would anyone add a scent to a garbage bag? Please, at least note on the box that the bags are scented. Very strong and headache-inducing scent. Will never buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: TurtleWins

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased these bags for a kitchen trashcan and they are durable. They are bigger than my trashcan but I love how much they hold because I'm lazy and I continue to top off the trashcan until I absolutely HAVE to take it out! Amazon makes them very affordable!
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Not so STRONG!
customer_reviews.text: These blue pull ties keep on effing ripping as I try to tie them, the bags rip as I attempt to remove from the can and the dullest items inside cause holes which leads to garbage juice leaking on my effing floor!
customer_reviews.author: Iannotti

customer_reviews.title: Item received before estimated delivery date and in good condition. Bag opening is smaller than my old ...
customer_reviews.text: Item received before estimated delivery date and in good condition. Bag opening is smaller than my old bags - these bags cannot be stretched over the rim of the basket. Good bag but doesn't fit my needs. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A ton of great garbage bags
customer_reviews.text: Great deal on a F ton of nice garbage bags. We use these in our kitchen bc the 13 gal bags are always too small. These are awesome and I love that they’re blackout.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Not as Strong
customer_reviews.text: It does hold two 13 gallon bags of trash, but a little "thinner" than the Hefty out of the grocery store or Wal-mart. I would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Loyal Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong
customer_reviews.text: This product is pretty well known. I ordered this as we were not leaving our house. Product came on time and without damage. Now, on to cleaning the garage...
customer_reviews.author: VP

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a simple trash bag
customer_reviews.text: At this price they're great. I dont care about paying a lot for trash bags I just want them to work. These will sometimes break at the handles, but trash doesnt fall out.
customer_reviews.author: 5.slow

customer_reviews.title: Not strong enough for yard debris.
customer_reviews.text: The bags are fine and the drawstrings are nice because they help with closing it. I intended to do use these for debris from yard and gardens. They were just not heavy enough.
customer_reviews.author: G. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good price. Convenient
customer_reviews.text: These are as predicted. This is the brand and type of bag we usually use. This was convenient to buy them here and we will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie L

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Value
customer_reviews.text: I had some home cleaning, and wanted to get rid of stuff I don't use, and can't recycle. These bags performed how they were supposed to. They where delivered quickly, and cheaper than any of my local stores.
customer_reviews.author: M.E.

customer_reviews.title: Success!
customer_reviews.text: They do a good job. I need them for...household trash. So far, so good. I had a previous problem with bargain bags so decided on these. Glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: elaine

customer_reviews.title: why buy anything else
customer_reviews.text: Hefty is the only trash bag I will use. I happen to like this one because, of the size and closure type. Hefty makes a good strong bag. I can't lift heavy bags I usually drag them. With hefty bags that is ok. They are strong enough to take it. I would use nothing else.
customer_reviews.author: B. ColemanTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great bags, good value - easy to tie, durable, worth the extra $!
customer_reviews.text: These are great bags. Spendy, but worth the extra $ not to have your bag break and trash strewn everywhere! They ARE strong and it is fair to claim to be the #1 value, they are as far as we’ve seen. Good solid strong ties prevent accidents too.
customer_reviews.author: CyDrgn

customer_reviews.title: Good Price
customer_reviews.text: At the time I bought them, they were a good price compared to my local grocery store. It was convenient to add them onto an order I was making. They are a good product.
customer_reviews.author: gendot

customer_reviews.title: Great garbage bags!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best garbage bags that I have bought! I buy them over and over again. People will not be disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Steven PetersonTop Contributor: Baseball

customer_reviews.title: Sturdiness, value
customer_reviews.text: Everyone is familiar with Hefty bags and products so I'll just say, great value for the amount of bags that are in the box.
customer_reviews.author: PJLG

customer_reviews.title: GET SOME! YOULL LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: Tough as hell! Best bags will keep these in my cart, does have some leakage but it can hold gallons or fluid and have a little drip , unlike other flimsy weak bags
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Hefty Large Garbage Bags
customer_reviews.text: Hefty garbage bags are good quality. I like the scent as well. It helps cover the garbage smell!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too thin and short fr Hefty use!
customer_reviews.text: Way too thin and short. Needs to be taller and at least 3 mil thick tone considered hefty and heavy duty. Worth the money but not for garage or out door use, maybe kitchen?
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better buy
customer_reviews.text: Same product I buy in store at a better price - just open the door and there it was. Can’t beat it. 😁. 5751
customer_reviews.author: 5751 Jackson Georgia

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Very durable, Can withhold a lot of weight and does not have any weird scent. Great if you are trying to save a little money.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Great trash bag. Tough too.
customer_reviews.text: These are unscented which is ok. We take it out before it smells anyway. They are a sturdy bag just don’t overload them. Easy to use. We have always used their products.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny & LaDonna

customer_reviews.title: good size
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed for the size of the box and how many bags for the price. Good buy
customer_reviews.author: Arlene J Brosky

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain
customer_reviews.text: So much cheaper buying this quantity than in supermarket. They are great sturdy bags.
customer_reviews.author: Lives to read!

customer_reviews.title: Trash bags...Um, ya.  They really work!
customer_reviews.text: You got trash? These bags got your back! I expected bags for my trash but what I got was more of a home for my garbage. I haven't run out yet, but I figure once I do, I can use the large empty box as a small summer cabin for my cat. The box perfectly matches his taste in empty boxes. Bravo trash gods! Keep on bagging!!
customer_reviews.author: Paul R Countryman

customer_reviews.title: If you want them to tie - don't buy
customer_reviews.text: The blue ribbing that helps close the bag when you pull to close just comes right out. The flap that is to cover the blue strip is not glued, so you end up having a bag that you can not keep closed.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela A.

customer_reviews.title: They are okay bags for kitchen trash can
customer_reviews.text: These bags have lasted me almost 3 months so far and I have at least 30 more bags left. They are somewhat durable, however they can tear easily near the blue drawstring handles. They have a light barely noticeable scent and the bags are sturdy enough to carry heavy items if you make a knot to tie the bag close.
customer_reviews.author: Ariee

customer_reviews.title: Regular Hefty Bags
customer_reviews.text: Kept forgetting to buy them at store. Great price here and delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie C.

customer_reviews.title: Decent bag
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good. There is an occasional failure when filling, but nothing extreme. I’ll continue to buy them.
customer_reviews.author: Gpwiel

customer_reviews.title: reliable and strong
customer_reviews.text: a good quantity at a low cost and super fast shipping, Amazon the best to buy
customer_reviews.author: hugo alberto soriano

customer_reviews.title: Great quality bags
customer_reviews.text: Hefty is one of the best brands when it comes to quality, and do not tear as easy as other brands.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Wish they were a lil stronger, but they work well
customer_reviews.text: Had a little bit of a rip at the top of the first bag I used, but otherwise they've been great.
customer_reviews.author: Stebs

customer_reviews.title: Not heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Bought these and just used one for the first time. They are not strong or heavy duty. Apparently the return window has closed. Now I have to just toss them.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon E.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed with the quality of the trash bags. One of the reasons I purchase this is for the convenience of the drawstring. It does not work. Every bag in the box is defective. The workmanship is terrible. the draw string and the hem that contains the drawstring are incorrectly glued. Totally unable to tie the bag closed.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Dougherty

customer_reviews.title: Great bags
customer_reviews.text: Holds up to several kitchen bags for less smell in hot weather.
customer_reviews.author: smo

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and resistant.
customer_reviews.text: Very durable and resistant. this is a great trash bag, very strong and good capacity. I'm buying it again and again...
customer_reviews.author: Fausto

customer_reviews.title: Great value for daily use
customer_reviews.text: Great value for money. Use daily and definitely more expensive buying at store
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Not flex bags but these are strong. I will buy these now. Way cheaper than the stores
customer_reviews.text: These are not flex bags, but they are strong. And way cheaper than the store. Love them. Will keep buying them. A++
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Who wants to go out and buy trash bags!
customer_reviews.text: Convenience is buying essentials online and Amazon delivers quality products right to your door.
customer_reviews.author: Rrichard

customer_reviews.title: Durable and great value
customer_reviews.text: No fowl smell, so not sure why rates scent. Theses are durable and great price for bulk buy.
customer_reviews.author: Liz D

customer_reviews.title: Used it for yard waste
customer_reviews.text: Sticks had a hard time breaking through these if that gives you an idea on its durability.
customer_reviews.author: Seduce & Destroy

customer_reviews.title: Durable product
customer_reviews.text: not to concerned about the scent however they are roomy and very durable which is what I needed
customer_reviews.author: Robert D. Massie

customer_reviews.title: Best on the market for our use
customer_reviews.text: Good product, heavy duty.my wife doesn't want any other brand for our trash cans.
customer_reviews.author: Peewee Callahan

customer_reviews.title: Arrived promptly and undamaged
customer_reviews.text: I didn't understand the scent portion of this review. This product was unscented. Overall, pretty good value for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: javamandon

customer_reviews.title: Hefty
customer_reviews.text: They are trash bags just shipped instead of picked up.
customer_reviews.author: Uleta

customer_reviews.title: Garbage bags
customer_reviews.text: Great product but never buying again because my spouse keeps throwing them out every week!
customer_reviews.author: Lilcarp

customer_reviews.title: Reliable for the tough jobs
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses these to bag our grass and they never rip. Very thick and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Strong bag
customer_reviews.text: Great garbage bag, strong. We have been buying these for years

customer_reviews.title: Please don't charge me for 2bottles because I only got 1
customer_reviews.text: Did not receive but I did get the next delivery so I got 1 bottle not 2

customer_reviews.title: Time to re-up
customer_reviews.text: Buy these you wont regret.. the box last for 6 months with a family of 4 that throws parties for time to time

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: They work well and fit nicely in cans...nice to have the pull strings for closure and tying.

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: What can I say they are trash bag they a good quality would definitely recommend they arrived on time

customer_reviews.title: Just what i was looking for!  NOT force flex :)
customer_reviews.text: Just what i was looking for! NOT force flex :)

customer_reviews.title: Box came cut open
customer_reviews.text: Product came late and the box looks like it was cut open.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase and very sturdy. I try to buy all my bags from Amazon.

customer_reviews.title: !!️!!️!!️The best bags!!️!!️!!️
customer_reviews.text: Been using these bags forever, they’re the best!!! You just can’t beat the price on Amazon, am so thankful for that too!!️!!️

customer_reviews.title: They live up to their name
customer_reviews.text: Just right! Holds my trash and expands when I pull it out of the kitchen trash can so I can empty smaller cans into it before closing it up. Good and stretchy without rupturing.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy A. Emlinger

customer_reviews.title: Prefer flexible/expandable bags.
customer_reviews.text: No scent but that's what I wanted! Not as strong as I would have liked. Small box poked holes in side. Flexible bags better for me.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy Great Quanity!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good buy - 74 bags for $16.00 - you can’t beat it!

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Not as sturdy as end durable as I would have liked. Just a regular trash bag.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: These are good trash bags, and are the ones we choose to use on a regular basis

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: These are well priced but a little thinner than the same size bags I buy in the grocery store. They are fine however.

customer_reviews.title: Strong, large, effective
customer_reviews.text: These bags do exactly as advertised. They are large, strong, and easy to use. A good product.

customer_reviews.title: If you want big strong bags these are the one
customer_reviews.text: These trash bags are just what I was looking for. They are durable, strong and roomy. I use them in my kitchen and one bag takes care of the trash for the whole house, no waste. I will be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: lena 3.5

customer_reviews.title: Pricing is good
customer_reviews.text: Great deal on the trash bags. Qaulity is always good. Hefty is a good brand that we have used for years

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: never been so excited about garbage bags.. but this huge box of 74 bags is very much appreciated.. hefty black large bags are a exactly what i need for large garage cans

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad. Good bang for buck.
customer_reviews.text: These rip a little bit more than I'd prefer but overall not so bad. Price is decent in comparison to quality so I'll keep getting hefty brand.

customer_reviews.title: These are solid
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. I use them for my kitchen trash. They feel solid and I would purchase again.

customer_reviews.title: Strong and dependable!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Hefty thrash bags for years. They are great! They have never failed me.

customer_reviews.title: Getting more for your money.
customer_reviews.text: Love having this on auto order and the count is higher than the store bought ones. The price is good. I pay more for less other places. You always need trash bags.

customer_reviews.title: fit my 21gal
customer_reviews.text: they work Edit: And why is the sensitivity filter hitting all my reviews?

customer_reviews.text: Box arrived open as possibly used?? There was a loose bag just stuffed back into opened box.

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised on box
customer_reviews.text: I received these hefty strong garbage bag box of 74 quantity 30 gallon capacity. I am very pleased with this product but when I got to the 2nd roll of bags, they were not as thick and did not have the drawstring on them. Wondering if report goes to you at amazon or to hefty company??

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY TRASH BAGS
customer_reviews.text: I USE THESE BAGS FOR OFFICE USE AND THEY'RE GREAT. THIS IS A GREAT PRICE FOR THE QUANTITY AND QUALITY.

customer_reviews.text: I won't be going to the store for a while and have some extra long term money

customer_reviews.title: Not garbage garbage bags.
customer_reviews.text: No problems with this brand. Opens easily and closes tightly.

product_meta.title: Hefty Strong Large Trash/Garbage Bags, Multipurpose, Unscented, Drawstring
product_meta.description: Do more with Hefty Strong Large Trash Bags. Versatile and strong, these heavy duty bags are ideal for extra-large kitchen cans or big clean-up jobs throughout the home, yard and garage. Signature Hefty heavy-duty quality ensures superior puncture resistance and drawstring dependability. Large 30 gallon size and thicker plastic are ideal for tackling kitchen mess, post-party clean-up, seasonal item storage, donations, or basement and garage clean-up.
feature_bullets: This package contains 74 Hefty Strong, large, unscented, 30 gallon black garbage bags, each 1.05 mil thick
Versatile and strong, these heavy duty Hefty 30 gallon trash bags are ideal for extra-large kitchen cans or big clean up jobs throughout the home, yard and garage
Signature Hefty quality ensures these trash can liners will offer superior puncture resistance and drawstring dependability
Hefty large black trash bags feature a thicker gauge plastic to stand up to tough indoor and outdoor jobs while keeping waste hidden
